boardgame.name: Battledroids
BattleTech
BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat
קרב-טכ משחק לוחמה משורינת
boardgame.description: BattleTech (or _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;BT_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;) is a science-fiction tactical wargame in which players battle one another with various war machines. The heart of the game is the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;BattleMech_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;: a giant fighting robot; typical games have each player controlling from 1-4 'Mechs. Vehicles, infantry, power armour, aircraft and other unit types also exist. The game system includes details such as varying weapon ranges, heat generation, and discrete hit locations (torso, arms, legs, etc.). 'Mechs vary greatly by mobility and firepower, and players can choose from provided designs or take the time to create their own 'Mechs from scratch. The game is typically played on one or more mapsheets or mounted map boards; optional rules are also available for hexless play. An extensive line of pewter figurines ('Mechs, vehicles, and the like) are available from Iron Wind Metals. (Many earlier BattleTech figures were produced and sold by Ral Partha, which still handles the figure line in Europe.)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The main component of the current generation of BattleTech is a series of core rulebooks, the central one being Total Warfare, which contains the main rules for the game (the 2018 reprint is up-to-date in terms of errata fixes). TechManual contains construction rules for 'Mechs and other units, for those who want to create their own custom units. A series of four advanced rulebooks expands the game in many different ways: Tactical Operations adds a wide variety of gear and optional rules; Strategic Operations, Interstellar Operations, and Campaign Operations are more esoteric, covering a variety of mass-combat rulesets, rules for running your own mercenary units, and unusual equipment. The final core rulebook available is A Time of War: The BattleTech RPG._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;BT is also supplemented by a variety of Technical Readouts, which provide gameplay and background data on 'Mechs and other units at various time periods in the game-universe history; map sets, including the new Hex Pack hard-mounted maps with tile overlays; sourcebooks; and pregenerated record sheets, as well as the aforementioned miniatures (which are not required for play)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As in earlier editions of BattleTech, introductory box sets are available. The current versions (due in October 2018) are the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Beginner Box_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (contains 2 plastic 'Mechs, a map, and simplified quick-start 'Mech rules) and, immediately following, the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;A Game of Armored Combat_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; box (8 plastic 'Mechs, mapsheets, cardboard 'Mech standees, and the full rules for 'Mechs and basic gear)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Core Rulebooks_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Battletech: Total Warfare (Standard Game Rules for the most common unit types)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Classic Battletech: Tech Manual (Standard Unit Construction)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Classic Battletech: Tactical Operations (Advanced Ground Rules _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Construction)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Classic Battletech: Strategic Operations (Advanced Aerospace Rules _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Construction, Complete Battleforce Rules)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; BattleTech: Interstellar Operations_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A Time of War: The BattleTech RPG (RPG rules)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A Time of War Companion (RPG supplement)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; BattleTech: Alpha Strike (Fast-Play Rules)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; BattleMech Manual (a 'Mechs-only rulebook, but rewritten for clarity and featuring most relevant gear from Tactical Operations and Interstellar Operations)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Introductory Supplements_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Technical Readout: 3039_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Record Sheets: 3039 (print version is abridged; PDF is unabridged)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Classic Battletech Starterbook: Sword and Dragon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Battletech Hexpack: Lakes and Rivers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Battletech HexPack: Cities and Roads_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Battletech HexPack: Mountains and Canyons_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Other Supplements (partial list)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Classic Battletech: Dawn of the Jihad_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Battletech: Chaos Campaign_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Classic Battletech Starterbook: Wolf and Blake_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Classic Battletech Map Compilation 1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Classic Battletech Map Compilation 2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Classic Battletech: Mercenaries Supplemental_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Rules Expansions for Previous Editions (partial list)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; In Italian. Fasa 4th edition, 1996. Contains immaculate hex maps, cardboard mechs, books, plastic stands and dice, etc. Buyer pays shipping. Item ships when payment is received.

This version of Battletech is c. 1984. It includes stand-up cardboard counters with bases instead of miniatures. There are a few extra photocopies of armor diagrams. Two side panels of the box have some outward bowing and creasing, and the box top has some _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;bubbles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Edges show some wear and there are small rips at two corners.

Box is rather damaged with some creasing on the cover. I am also including Citytech with this item. Also included are several extra supplemental maps that do not come with either Battletech or Citytech and the Battletech Compendium, which includes the complete rules to Battletech, Citytech, Aerotech, and other supplemental rules. Drop a message with any questions or offers. *Sorry, no credit cards. FREE GIFT TO FIRST 9 OR SO BUYERS!!!!
Box shows wear. Everything seems to be there.

Battletech 1992 FASA Corp (Third Edition) #1604. Includes two 22_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;x27_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; mapsheets, rulebook, record sheets, 2 dice, 14 miniatures (13 plastic, 1 metal). I do not believe the metal one was supposed to come with it, made by Ral Partha but looks similar to the other miniatures. One of the plastic miniatures was partially painted red. Overall everything is in very good condition and appears to contain everything you need to play. Box is solid with no splits. Shipping weight is 3 pounds.

This is for the 3rd edition boxed set. All of the robots, maps, and rulebook are included. I also have 2 extra metal miniatures in the box. The original 2 six sided dice are not in the box, but shouldn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t be difficult to replace. I charge only actual shipping costs (USPS priority mail w/delivery confirmation, box, packing tape, bubble wrap and styrofoam noodles). Paypal payments only, using credit card, debit card, or checking account payment.

Battletech basic game in good shape. This game comes with plastic mechs, all are present and undamaged. Shipping is calculated based on where you live. I can send it via Priority Mail if you live in the US. Feel free to ask questions!
4th edition, base set. Some box wear.

I have 11 original edition Battletech miniatures for sale or trade. Please email with offers. Several of them are painted. The paint job is not professional, but it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s fairly nice. I painted these when I was probably about 15 years old, so don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t expect artistry. A couple of the mechs need to be reassembled with some glue. The mech types are: Griffin, Wasp, Stinger, Crusader, Wolverine, Archer, Marauder, Warhammer, Shadow Hawk, Goliath, Thunderbolt. The Wolverine, Archer, Shadow Hawk, and Thunderbolt are painted. Here are some photos of the actual minis: http://boardgamegeek.com/image/280611 http://boardgamegeek.com/image/281207 http://boardgamegeek.com/image/280622 http://boardgamegeek.com/image/280629 These are available individually, or as a set. Make me an offer!

Never played and in excellent condition. Some scuffing to the box as a result of its age, but only cosmetic. Components have not been punched, and all of the components are in as new condition. Shipping to UK addresses would be £4.20 via MyHermes 3-day parcel delivery. Overseas delivery: just let me know your location and I will provide a quote. I look forward to hearing from you with any questions. Check out my other games for sale on BGG and ask for a bundle price for multiple games. Paul
Excellent condition. Most bits unpunched.

This is the popular 3rd edition boxed set including miniatures! Boxed set is complete and unplayed, with all miniatures in pristine condition. CONTENTS: * 14 unpainted plastic miniatures of the most common BattleMechs used in the Inner Sphere * Two 22_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; x 27_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; full-color mapsheets * One 56-page rulebook * One 16-page book of pregenerated BattleMech Record Sheets Shipping will be added if items are not picked up locally. Shipping is through USPS from zip code 22306, or as otherwise arranged with buyer. Thanks for looking!

Box is opened but never used. Miniatures unpopped. All material is present. The box has a dent in it and some scuffed corners but the contents are untouched. Contains 14 plastic miniatures, Two Full-Color Maps, One Rulebook, One book of Battlemech Record Sheets and 2 six-sided dice.

A lot of cardboard, maps, and manuals (no minis) in three boxes. From the manuals, it looks like there are the contents of the following present: Battletech, Citytech, Battletech Reinforcements, and 2 x Battletech Reinforcements 2. I got this used and am selling it as is, although the contents look to be in great shape.

Components are in excellent condition and COMPLETE. Counters are punched. Box shows shelf wear and creases but has full structural integrity. Rulebook is clean and crisp. Maps are in excellent, like new condition. This is from my personal collection and was kept in a cool, dry, smoke-free environment. Add $15 shipping for Priority Mail 2-Day™.
